name: Multipliers
objective: Multiply by 2 the 6-digit number formed by the %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs and write the result on the %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs in the same way (1 digit by egg). Then drop all %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs at the same time between the two %%icon icon-bonfire$%% bonfires.
loss_reason_wrong_number: There is an error in the calculation
loss_reason_not_same_time: Heroes must drop all %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs at the same time between the two %%icon icon-bonfire$%% bonfires.
